All Implemented Interfaces:
com.telenav.kivakit.component.Component, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Broadcaster, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Listener, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.MessageTransceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Repeater, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Transceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.core.registry.RegistryTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.lifecycle.Operation, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.lifecycle.Startable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.lifecycle.Stoppable<com.telenav.kivakit.core.time.Duration>, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Receiver, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Transmitter, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.Nameable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.NamedObject
public class JettyServer extends com.telenav.kivakit.component.BaseComponent implements com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.lifecycle.Startable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.lifecycle.Stoppable<com.telenav.kivakit.core.time.Duration>
A convenient way to use Jetty for simple web applications.

A Jetty web server can quickly and easily be started on a particular port with a given set of servlets and filters.

Support is available for:

  • Wicket
  • Jersey
  • Swagger

Example:

 // Create the Jersey REST application with Swagger documentation,
 var application = new MyRestApplication();
 var jersey = new JerseyJettyPlugin(application);
 var swaggerOpenApi = new SwaggerOpenApiJettyPlugin(application);
 var swaggerWebJar = new SwaggerWebJarAssetJettyPlugin();

 // create the Wicket WebApplication,
 var wicket = new WicketJettyPlugin(ServiceRegistryWebApplication.class);

 // and start up Jetty.
 listenTo(new JettyServer())
     .port(port)
     .add("/*", wicket)
     .add("/api/*", jersey)
     .add("/open-api/*", swaggerOpenApi)
     .add("/docs/*", new SwaggerIndexJettyPlugin(assets(), port))
     .add("/webjar/*", swaggerWebJar)
     .start();

Mounting Plugins

  • mount(String, BaseAssetsJettyPlugin)
  • mount(String, BaseFilterJettyPlugin)
  • mount(String, BaseServletJettyPlugin)

Configuration

  • port(int)

CORS

  • addCrossOriginFilter(ObjectSet, ObjectSet, ObjectSet, Duration)

Starting and Stopping

  • isRunning()
  • maximumStopTime()
  • start()
  • stop(Duration)
  • waitForTermination()
